Reviews.Title: “good hotel, not in city center”
Reviews.Author: quandosiparte
Reviews.Content: we stayed one night in this hotel. we lost our connection in istanbul airport and the airlines company host us in this hotel. our room was fine, with complimentary tea and coffee. the room and also the bathroom were very clean. no noise during the night. free wi-fi. breakfast was very good, a lot of food, local and european. we also had dinner there, nothing special but good. the hotel is far from city center, but if you cross the road and walk for 3 min you''l reach otogar metro station, you can take a few stops and than a bus, the journey takes 20 min more or less.

Reviews.Title: “Really rude staff, stinking rooms and dirty carpets”
Reviews.Author: woaishanghai
Reviews.Content: Okay, this has 4 star rating but is really maintained like a 2 star. Rooms are okay but stink of cigarettes and carpets are old and dirty. Having stayed in a lot of hotels, this was certainly the worst in Turkey. As in many other shops, restaurants and hotels, staff was helpful only when it came to basic things. The most amazing thing was the total lack of any service once payment was made. We turned from being their guests to being invisible. One of the managers was good though everyone else seemed to think they are doing you a favor. The location is quite odd. We took this as this was near to the bus station/ Otogar but, in reality, it's hard to get there because of the big roads, probably highways, and far off pedestrian crossings. You will need a taxi to go anywhere even if it is across the road, unless you are okay with spending 15 minutes figuring out where to cross and how to go. When asked for help, staff simply said, "Take a taxi." They seem to get quite a few tour groups and Turkish Airline passengers so maybe that's the reason for the indifference. Stay at other hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for transit but service can be better”
Reviews.Author: KathyTham
Reviews.Content: My friends and I (four of us) stayed at Grand S Hotel during our first day in Turkey, Istanbul. The main reason why we chose this hotel is because it is about 15mins walk to the Bayrampasa Bus Terminal where we headed to take a bus to Safranbolu the very next day - and we wanted to just rest after a 11-hour flight from Singapore to Istanbul. We requested for early check-in at 6am via email but was told that early check-in would only be granted if we pay 20 euros per person for breakfast. Finding this rather ridiculous, we decided to just let it be and settle the issue when we were there. On the day of our arrival at the hotel, upon telling the staff of our room reservation, we were greeted with a "this is not my problem. your check-in time is at 12pm". We understand that it is unusual for early check-in at 6am but it would be much appreciated if the hotel staff could provide us with a solution (such as paying extra for early check-in) instead of just saying "this is not my problem". After much debate, we managed to get a room for the 4 of us to rest till 12pm - a sigh of relief. With the poor service aside, the hotel rooms are spotless and splendid. Beds are soft and comfy with nice flat screen TV. Breakfast is excellent too with quite a wide selection of bread. The service was also much better on the very next day when we were checking out, so it could be that the hotel staff was over stressed on the day we arrived - with all due respect, he's quite an old man after all =) All in all, if you are looking for a hotel that's quiet, near to bus station and away from all the hussle and bussle, Grand S Hotel would be a perfect choice! If you want to stay near all the attractions, I'm sure you can find something more suitable inside Sultanahmet area =)

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: efesmurat
Reviews.Content: This hotel is too far from everything but main bus terminal.Rooms are ok for a three to four star hotel.Services are below Turkish standards .watch out if you are crossing the road as it is not that easy.Breakfast is ok.I would stay elsewhere unless i had business in this particular neighborhood and if i couldn't effort crown plaza hotel next door.

Reviews.Title: “very helpful staff,nice food and convenient prices”
Reviews.Author: ahmed h
Reviews.Content: i came over on 1 oct 2011 for my honeymoon and i really enjoyed my stay very much although it is little bit far from some places but the metro made really very easy as it was across the street and be careful from the restaurant beside the hotel it gives different prices every day although the ordered food is the same!!! beside the hotel there are many restaurants and markets in case you need any thing and it is worthy to mention that the hotel food was great and with same prices as outside Special thanks to the front office team specially (MOURAD) as he guided me to many lovely unforgettable tours and instructed me how to get to metro and other lovely places. i would love to come again thats for sure

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel but too many rules”
Reviews.Author: awesomealanya
Reviews.Content: stayed here for daughters 18th birthday, lovely modern hotel but a fair distance from the sights, breakfast fab even for veggies, we had problems wiv pool as you must buy swim hat a 10 lira each and dont bother with the gym unless you have proper clothes with you! be careful of room service as some staff are perverts,we found food in restaurant next door cheap and great, try it!

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant stay! Sad to leave”
Reviews.Author: OrangeShrew
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean. Perfect location to go off and explore!! Next to the tramline so dead easy to get about. DO NOT USE TAXIS!!!! its dead easy to get to the airport by metro. People are lovely just 100%. Aircon isnt great but we did complain as it wasnt that bad... Would go back next week if I could!!!!!! Ps DONT GO TO RESTURANT NEXT TO HOTEL they rip you off hotel as no prices on the menu- hotel is same price and much better food. Big thanks to the guys on reception and Mahmut the waiter

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience! I'll love to be back!”
Reviews.Author: Jade_Lim
Reviews.Content: I've been a guest at the Grand S Hotel (Istanbul, Turkey) from 14/05/2011 to 15/05/2011 and it had been a wonderful experience. The room is clean, cozy and comfortable. The location of the hotel was excellent as it is near the airport and just 10 minutes drive away from the Taksim Square. The staff there were warm and helpful, and special thanks to Yasin DaÅŸ for giving me directions to and from Taksim Square. I will definitely stay here again on my next trip to Turkey.

Reviews.Title: “A quiet and pleasant stay at the best price”
Reviews.Author: Ruslana_G
Reviews.Content: I qualify this hotel with a high level of service and hospitality. The room was very clean and cozy. Location is comfortable for guests who come by car, but for other guests metro or bus stations are situated very close. I liked very much the kind attitude of personal, the cleanness of room, very delicious breakfast. It is good area for shopping (Forum Istanbul, Ikea, Praktiker, Saturn).

Reviews.Title: “Great location for the airport”
Reviews.Author: OZIIAntalya
Reviews.Content: Five minutes from the airport so very convienient if arriving late or starting early .Breakfast great choice available . It was a good comfortable stay

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed my stay”
Reviews.Author: Tanfeer
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay at this hotel. No problems what so ever. Clean rooms, nice and friendly staff and good service. I would come here again with out any hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “â€œGreat Location, Great front deskâ€�”
Reviews.Author: avatif
Reviews.Content: I rated this hotel as an Excellent hotel. I stayed for 5 days, enjoyed them to top. every thing went well, and will work if you're dealing with the right guy, for me I was only dealing with Mujgan and Avatif Havva . in the front desk, Excellent Language skills, with a professional smile that makes your day, and great handling with troubles (which happening every where). Avatif Havva Helped me a lot, Advised me where and how to go, solved the Problems overall. I can't say any thing but thank you. The Location of the hotel is over discretion, just close to all transportation in Istanbul.
